title: Betsy Who Cried Wolf
description: On her eighth birthday Betsy takes the Shepherds' Oath and is determined to be the best shepherd in Bray Valley history. Any wolf who tries to eat her sheep had better watch out. But Zimmo is no ordinary wolfâ€”he's a hungry wolf, with a plan! author: Gail Carson Levine
